Package com.simpleprogrammer.infinitetcp

Interface ServerListener

  • public interface ServerListener
    This interface defines a onDisconnect(Connection) method, a onReceive(Connection, Object) method, and a onConnect(Connection) method
    The onDisconnect(Connection) method is called when a Client disconnects from the Server and
    the method onReceive(Connection, Object) is called when an object is received from a Client and
    the method onConnect(Connection) is called when a Client connects to the Server .

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onConnect​(Connection conn)
      This method should be called when a Client connects to the Server
      It is called by the Server class when a Client connects
      void onDisconnect​(Connection conn)
      This method should be called when a Client disconnects from the Server
      It is called by the Connection class when the Client disconnects
      void onReceive​(Connection conn, java.lang.Object obj)
      This method should be called when the Server received something from a Client It is called by the Connection class when it receives something

    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        void onConnect​(Connection conn)
        This method should be called when a Client connects to the Server
        It is called by the Server class when a Client connects
        Parameters:
        conn - the Connection to the Client

      • onReceive

        void onReceive​(Connection conn,
               java.lang.Object obj)
        This method should be called when the Server received something from a Client It is called by the Connection class when it receives something
        Parameters:
        obj - the Object received
        conn - the Connection that the Server received the Object from

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect​(Connection conn)
        This method should be called when a Client disconnects from the Server
        It is called by the Connection class when the Client disconnects
        Parameters:
        conn - the Connection to the Client that disconnected
